name: The Asylum (Aurel Pop)
description:
The Asylum is a 2D Adventure Game (with action points) in German, taking place in the 1930s. It combines a sad and dark atmosphere with humoristic elements. Can you solve the cognitive puzzles on 2 levels to escape the Asylum before the scheduled lobotomy?

How to play with Gamepad (recommended)

  • Move the player character with left joystick
  • Interact with objects and NPCs through the buttons A, X, B (the buttons above the right joystick)
  • Close any interaction with button A
  • Change numbers on locks with D-Pad (the pad below the left joystick)
  • Solve the cognitive puzzles to get to the next level, and be aware that you only have a few action points before the lobotomy
  • Close the game with ALT + F4

How to play with Keyboard

  • Move the player character with W, A, S, D
  • Interact with objects and NPCs through the keys 1, 2, 3 (the keys above Q, W, E)
  • Close any interaction with key 1
  • Change numbers on locks with right arrow keys (keys below the delete key)
  • Solve the cognitive puzzles to get to the next level, and be aware that you only have a few action points before the lobotomy
  • Close the game with ALT + F4

Team

  • Aurel - Programmer, Mechanics Designer
  • Giulia - Artist, Animator
  • Daniela - Voice-Overs, Cutscenes
  • Alex - Narrative Designer
  • Leon - Music Composer
